column2: featuring a cover illustration by J.R.R. Tolkien

column1: * 1956 - The first episode of The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings airs on the BBC Third Programme.
* 1979 - Pictures by J.R.R. Tolkien is published in the US.
* 2007 - The Children of Húrin Signed Limited Edition is published.

column2: The Tolkien Trust and HarperCollins file another lawsuit with New Line Cinema and the Saul Zaentz Company over merchandising rights.

column1: ** Tuor and Voronwë pass the Seven Gates of Gondolin to reach Gondolin. They are taken to Turgon who is told that they should abandon the city; Turgon decides to stay.
